Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Hubei Ruibang Biotechnology Co., Ltd., established in December 2007 and located in Jingzhou Development Zone, Hubei Province, has a registered capital of 100 million yuan. The company covers an area of over 400 mu (approximately 66.67 hectares) and currently employs more than 300 staff members, with an annual production capacity of 10,000 tons. It specializes in biological active peptide series products (including various animal peptides and plant peptides). Since 2005, the company has been dedicated to researching and developing biological active peptide production technologies, making it one of the founding enterprises in China's biological active peptide industry and a leading player among biological active peptide manufacturers. At present, the company's production capacity ranks first in China and third globally.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: A research video on bioactive peptide series products, which are suitable for many fields such as beauty, food, health products, and medicine. Successfully developed a series of products including fish collagen peptide, ovalbumin peptide, soy peptide, turtle shell peptide, corn peptide, etc
